cli_content:
Capability codes:
  (R) Router, (B) Bridge, (T) Telephone, (C) DOCSIS Cable Device
  (W) WLAN Access Point, (P) Repeater, (S) Station, (O) Other
Device ID            Local Intf      Hold-time  Capability  Port ID  
nx-osv9000-3-long-name.com
                     Eth1/1          120        BR          Ethernet1/1

                     Eth1/2          120        BR          Ethernet1/1

Total entries displayed: 3
textfsm_template:
Value NEIGHBOR_NAME (\S+)
Value LOCAL_INTERFACE (\S+)
Value NEIGHBOR_INTERFACE (\S+)
Value CAPABILITIES (\w+)

Start
  ^Device.*ID -> LLDP

LLDP
  ^${NEIGHBOR_NAME}$$
  ^${NEIGHBOR_NAME}\s+${LOCAL_INTERFACE}\s+\d+\s+(${CAPABILITIES}?\s)+\s+${NEIGHBOR_INTERFACE} -> Record
  ^\s+${LOCAL_INTERFACE}\s+\d+\s+(${CAPABILITIES}?\s)+\s+${NEIGHBOR_INTERFACE} -> Record
